sentences.sentence: All the priories were made directly subject to the abbot of Cluny.
sentences.translation: 所有小修道院都由克吕尼的院长直接管理。

sentences.sentence: Compared with traditional machine tool, parallel machine tool has such priories as high response velocity, high accessional technology value, and high adaptability to circumstance.
sentences.translation: 与传统机床相比，并联机床具有刚度重量比大、响应速度快、环境适应性强和技术附加值高等优点。
